thread.title: Charges dropped for Hartford man accused of killing 2-year-old
thread.title_full: Charges dropped for Hartford man accused of killing 2-year-old - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Charges dropped for Hartford man accused of killing 2-year-old
text:
WHITE RIVER JUNCTION, Vt. - He was charged with beating his girlfriend's toddler to death, now trouble with evidence means the murder charges have been dismissed.
Luke Theriault was accused of striking 2-year-old Jamaal Turkvan so many times the child died. Theriault pleaded not guilty in 2014.
And now, the second degree murder charge against the Hartford, Vermont man has been dropped. The prosecutor tells WCAX there were concerns and doubt about evidence in the case.
Related Stories:
Vt. man suspected of killing 2-year-old released from prison
Hartford man held without bail for allegedly killing toddler
Hartford man charged with toddler's death
